
{{alias}}
    Regular expression to parse a UNC path.

    Examples
    --------
    > var path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz:a:b';
    > var bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz::b';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz:a';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\server\\share';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\server\\\\share';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\\\\\server\\share';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = 'beep boop \\\\server\\share';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\server';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz:';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz:a:';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz::';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\baz:a:b:c';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '\\\\server\\share\\foo\\bar\\';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '//server/share';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '/foo/bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = 'foo/bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = './foo/bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '/foo/../bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false

    See Also
    --------
